attributes.action: charge interest on all moneys paid back by mps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Money that has been claimed by mps and are now paying back should be liable to an interest charge as they have had the use of said claims.
This is the same as borrowing money from a bank.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
